name: Cuzco's Adventure
description:
Solve the puzzles of the Huayna Picchu's temple and face the demons of the inside to escape. This game was made during the UJI University GameJam January 2020.

The team:

- Carlos Benedito Tabares

-Josep Doménech Carrasco

-Daniel Miguel Pérez Maccari

-Haroun Guechairi Benterkia

-Adrián Mon Maroto

-Gonzalo Ramia García

-Fernando Gramage Rodríguez
